ch0106_80_kamitsure/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Keep on
smiling like you always do!
ch0106_80_kamitsure/0101_0701_02_10:
That smile of yours is so bright, it’ll spark the
light in the people around you, too!
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7101_0701_01_10:
Fashion’s not just about wearing fancy clothes. It’s
also about rocking the simple look, too.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7101_0701_02_10:
What’s important is how those clothes show
off the personality and charm of the person
wearing them!
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7102_0701_01_10:
Roller coasters and ferris wheels are a must-have
in any amusement park.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7102_0701_02_10:
My Emolga is used to high places, so she really
enjoys both of them!
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7102_0701_03_10:
Hanging out at the amusement park with your
Pokémon is loads of fun. You should try it one day.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7103_0701_01_10:
Electric-type Pokémon are so adorable and have
a dizzying charm to them, don’t you think?
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7103_0701_02_10:
What was it about your Pikachu that sparked
your attention?
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7104_0701_01_10:
Before I close my eyes at night, I like to think back
on my day and find something I like about myself.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7104_0701_02_10:
Your biggest fan is always you. Remember
that, OK?
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7105_0701_01_10:
There are a lot of people in the world, so
naturally, we all have completely different
thoughts and ideas.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7105_0701_02_10:
Sometimes people clash over their ideas, and that
can be painful. But going through that teaches you
valuable lessons.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7105_0701_03_10:
Just keep being yourself and carry on,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. After all, your
Pokémon will always be right by your side.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/7105_0701_04_10:
Pokémon are adorable creatures, but you can also
count on them when you’re in trouble!
ch0106_80_kamitsure/1701_0701_01_10: Here, I think this would be perfect for you!
ch0106_80_kamitsure/1701_0702_01_10: I hope you like that present I gave you!
ch0106_80_kamitsure/2501_0701_01_10:
Whenever I wear this outfit, it reminds me of
when I first decided on my life goals.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/2501_0701_02_10:
Back then, I vowed I’d shine brighter than anyone
else and become a Gym Leader and model at the
same time.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/2501_0701_03_10:
It was tough, but both Gym Leader Elesa and
model Elesa are what I’ve always wanted to be.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/2501_0702_01_10:
How about you? Do you still remember your first
hopes and dreams?
ch0106_80_kamitsure/2501_0702_02_10:
The first ones are always your feelings in their
purest form, so be sure to cherish them, OK? I’m
sure you’ll make them come true!
ch0106_80_kamitsure/2511_0701_01_10:
Emolga and Zebstrika are both well-behaved
and get along with each other.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/2511_0701_02_10:
Rotom sometimes plays little pranks on them, but
even that’s super cute.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/2511_0701_03_10:
They all shine in different ways... Without them, I 
wouldn’t be who I am today.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/2511_0702_01_10:
Watching Pokémon get along with each other
makes me melt inside. Is it the same for you?
ch0106_80_kamitsure/2511_0702_02_10:
Emolga gives me all the emol-tions! *chuckle*
Get it?
ch0106_80_kamitsure/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! You look like you could use some
sunshine, sleepyhead! That always seems to perk
me up.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/3003_0701_01_10:
I try to always hold my head up high. It makes
me feel a little more confident and beautiful
each day.
ch0106_80_kamitsure/3005_0701_01_10:
Some things only shine on the darkest nights,
wouldn’t you agree?
